name: BASED
description: $BASED is a leading culture coin on the Solana blockchain. Our mission at $BASED is to unite all of the truly based individuals across the blockchain. Saying someone is "based" is essentially giving them a nod of respect for their boldness and genuine nature. The term "based" in meme culture is used to describe someone who is unapologetically themselves and confident in their beliefs, often in a way that challenges social norms or political correctness.
